summary:
As a professional, I am characterized by action orientation, management speed, as well as teamwork skills.
I stand out for having great management of marketing and brand positioning. My main focus is to enhance the growth and reach of brands.
My main motivation is to participate in the actions and marketing strategies that allow the proper functioning of a company and its services, managing to meet the greatest number of expectations on the part of the client and the company.
My extensive knowledge of cultures and languages ​​allows me to achieve a greater understanding of what today's consumer is looking for, as well as being constantly informed of global trends.

education.degree_name: Licensed Publicist in Marketing, Advertising and Consumer Behavior

certifications.name: Marketing and Branding Certification Course at Dublin Business School
Titulo profesional- Publicista licenciada en marketing y conducta del consumidor

profile_positions.description:
-In charge of leading the development of our marketing plans working closely with clients, management, creative and content teams, and distribution partners, to create an effective and efficient marketing strategy focused on growing audiences for our products and services.
-Responsible for the strategic and tactical execution of marketing campaigns, including design of test/control segmentation, implementation of tests, tracking, results reporting, analysis, and recommendations
- Managing conception, development, and implementation of marketing plan and strategies, product concepts, and promotional programs to drive interest and sales.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Director

profile_positions.description:
-Worked to establish and implement strategic marketing plans designed to capitalize on market opportunities and achieve growth. 
-Assessed competition and determined business and marketing plans to be implemented. 
-Worked to foster a marketing plan that promoted brand awareness and effectively launched messages.
 -Led the company on strategy, content, and creative initiatives for fully-integrated marketing communications. 
-Successfully managed company social media campaigns. 
-Elaborated creative content ideas to increase revenue for brands such as Pizza Hut, Yves Rocher, Axe, Pepsico, Ballantines, Unilever, Sony, among others.
profile_positions.title: Sales & Marketing Director

profile_positions.description:
- Established and implemented yearly marketing strategies designed to capitalize on market opportunities, increasing revenue and brand awareness. 
- Developed marketing plans and POP Sales strategies, communicating the brands values in each message. 
- Built and managed Facebook & Instagram accounts, creating a large community in just a few months, creating content, designing offers, implementing influencer marketing strategies to increase the brand awareness and build the brands image in the local market, reaching the desired target audience. 
- Led the Paid Search Advertising strategy.
- Created the images and designs for the website communicating the brands campaigns monthly. 
-Led the company on strategy, content, and creative initiatives for fully-integrated marketing communications. -Successfully managed company social media investment in ads reaching the target audience with success. 
- Designed, developed and managed email campaigns. 
- Hosted & organized PR events with influencers, media and important clients.
 - Established collaborations with other brands in the industry creating cross-sales. 
- Directed advertising videos for special launches of categories or products. 
- Designed the visuals in-store and supervised the visual marketing at each point of purchase. 
- Built a team of influencers with which we collaborated monthly.
